channel.title: Website
channel.description: its possible to make a website with 000webhost and put my own template ? if yes anyone could help me? please thanks

item.title: Website
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

pkerjosh13:

Okay go here and get this https://filezilla-project.org/ , once you download this it will make things alot easier this is your ftp Program (File transfer Protocol) once you open that enter your host name which is your domain name, then your username and password all of this can be found in your control panel, then upload all the files inside your template folder to your website, if you need more help add me on skype joshua.coombs.7

i need a srs help ok i added u on skype just accept my request its helprsps

Read full topic

item.title: Website
item.dc:creator: @i_pwn_u11 i_pwn_u1
item.description:
@i_pwn_u11 wrote:

[quote=“Titanium_, post:2, topic:531907”]Its not hard at all. Go into your Control Panel, Go into the file manager, Delete all files in their, Upload a template. Boom your done.

If you want your own(with your own code) html and css stuff thats a little bit more work. For web development references use the place I used when I was learning. http://w3schools.com - Excellent website.[/quote]

can u help me? cause im to new on that on website never done before

Read full topic

item.title: Website
item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

Its not hard at all. Go into your Control Panel, Go into the file manager, Delete all files in their, Upload a template. Boom your done.

If you want your own(with your own code) html and css stuff thats a little bit more work. For web development references use the place I used when I was learning. http://w3schools.com - Excellent website.

Read full topic
